Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) and electron microscopy investigations have been performed on Sc2O3-stabilized ZrO2 as-sintered and after aging in air or in wet-forming gas at 850 degrees C for 1000 h. Some tetragonal to monoclinic transformation had occurred in the near-surface regions of 4 mol% Sc2O3 samples after aging; the phase transition was more severe for samples aged in the forming gas ambient.
Titulo: Structural evolution and electrical properties of Sc2O3-Stabilized ZrO2 aged at 850°C in air and wet-forming gas ambients

Sentencas: A decrease of similar to 20% in electrical conductivity accompanied the aging.
Titulo: Structural evolution and electrical properties of Sc2O3-Stabilized ZrO2 aged at 850°C in air and wet-forming gas ambients

Sentencas: In 6 mol% Sc2O3 samples, although no cubic to tetragonal transformation was detected, both the electrical conductivity and the activation energy for ionic conductivity decreased significantly during aging.
Titulo: Structural evolution and electrical properties of Sc2O3-Stabilized ZrO2 aged at 850°C in air and wet-forming gas ambients

Sentencas: Ten mole percent Sc2O3 samples did not show appreciable change in electrical conductivity due to aging, although some near-surface cubic to rhombohedral transformation did occur.
Titulo: Structural evolution and electrical properties of Sc2O3-Stabilized ZrO2 aged at 850°C in air and wet-forming gas ambients

Sentencas: Sharpening of the (400)(t) XRD peak of Sc2O3-stabilzed tetragonal ZrO2 accompanies the change(s) in the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Structural evolution and electrical properties of Sc2O3-Stabilized ZrO2 aged at 850°C in air and wet-forming gas ambients
